name: crossref-notes
description: Show hover popups for numbered notes cross-referenced in code comments (e.g., //note#10)

crossref-notes.notesFile.description: Path to the markdown file containing notes. Can be absolute or relative to workspace root.

crossref-notes.maxNoteLines.description: Maximum number of lines to include for each note from the notes file.

crossref-notes.crossRefPrefix.markdownDescription: Prefix for note cross-references in code comments (e.g., //n:#10). **Must be a string of letters only (A-Z, a-z).** If this setting is invalid, a warning will be shown and notes will not be matched.
crossref-notes.crossRefPrefix.patternErrorMessage: Prefix must be a string of letters only (A-Z, a-z).
